description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Pumpkin Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Pumpkin,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Spiced Pumpkin Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place vegetable stock into a saucepan and bring to the boil. Cut, peel and seed butternut pumpkin and add to stock. Cover saucepan, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until pumpkin is tender. Remove 1 cup of pumpkin mixture. Mash and cool.
Meanwhile heat olive oil in a small pan and add onion, garlic clove, ginger, cumin, coriander and dried chilli flakes. Cook for 5 minutes until onion is soft. Remove from heat.
Stir onion mixture into saucepan with remaining cooked pumpkin. Pur√©e mixture with a stick blender (or transfer mixture to a blender to process) until smooth.
Add 1 1/2 cups water and return to the boil. Ladle spiced pumpkin soup into warm bowls, top with a dollop of sour cream and fresh coriander. Serve.
